sources.title: Ditched | Full Movie | Survival Horror
sources.description:
Ditched - After a routine prison transfer crashes in the forest, young Inuit paramedic Melina finds herself surrounded by murderers with a mere 100 feet to climb out of a ditch to escape. When they are attacked by an unseen force in the forest, Melina's short journey to safety becomes the ultimate contest of wills.
2021.  Stars: Marika Sila, Kris Loranger, J. Lindsay Robinson
